33  ExecInstr::ExecInstr(Task *f, RandomVar *c, char *n) :
34  Instr(f, n), cost(c), _endEvt(this)
35  {
36  DBGTAG(_INSTR_DBG_LEV,"ExecInstr");
37  }

39  ExecInstr::ExecInstr(Task *f, auto_ptr<RandomVar> &c, char *n) :
40  Instr(f, n), cost(c), _endEvt(this)
41  {
42  DBGTAG(_INSTR_DBG_LEV,"ExecInstr");
43  }

45  Instr *ExecInstr::createInstance(vector<string> &par)
46  {
47  Instr *temp = 0;
48 
49  Task *task = dynamic_cast<Task *>(Entity::_find(par[1]));
50  if (isdigit((par[0].c_str())[0])) {
51  temp = new FixedInstr(task, atoi(par[0].c_str()));
52  }
53  else {
54  string token = get_token(par[0]);
55  string p = get_param(par[0]);
56  vector<string> parms = split_param(p);
57 
58  auto_ptr<RandomVar> var(genericFactory<RandomVar>::instance().create(token,parms));
59 
60  if (var.get() == 0) throw ParseExc("ExecInstr", par[0]);
61 
62  temp = new ExecInstr(task, var);
63  }
64  return temp;
65  }
66 
67  void ExecInstr::newRun()
68  {
69  actTime = lastTime = 0;
70  flag = true;
71  execdTime = 0;
72  executing = false;
73  }
74 
75  void ExecInstr::endRun()
76  {
77  _endEvt.drop();
78  }
79 
80  Tick ExecInstr::getExecTime() const
81  {
82  Tick t = SIMUL.getTime();
83  if (executing) return (execdTime + t - lastTime);
84  else return execdTime;
85  }
86 
87  Tick ExecInstr::getDuration() const
88  {
89  return (Tick)cost->get();
90  }
91 
92  Tick ExecInstr::getWCET() const throw(RandomVar::MaxException)
93  {
94  return (Tick) cost->getMaximum();
95  }
96 
97  void ExecInstr::schedule() throw (InstrExc)
98  {
99  DBGENTER(_INSTR_DBG_LEV);
100 
101  Tick t = SIMUL.getTime();
102  lastTime = t;
103  executing = true;
104 
105  if (flag) {
106 
107  DBGPRINT_3("Initializing ExecInstr ",
108  getName(),
109  " at first schedule.");
110  DBGPRINT_2("Time executed during the prev. instance: ",
111  execdTime);
112 
113  execdTime = 0;
114  actTime = 0;
115  flag = false;
116  currentCost = Tick(cost->get());
117 
118  DBGPRINT_2("Time to execute for this instance: ",
119  currentCost);
120  }
121 
122  CPU *p = _father->getCPU();
123  if (!dynamic_cast<CPU *>(p))
124  throw InstrExc("No CPU!", "ExeInstr::schedule()");
125 
126  double currentSpeed = p->getSpeed();
127 
128  Tick tmp = 0;
129  if (((double)currentCost) > actTime)
130  tmp = (Tick) ceil( ((double)currentCost - actTime)/currentSpeed);
131 
132  _endEvt.post(t + tmp);
133 
134  DBGPRINT("End of ExecInstr::schedule() ");
135 
136  }
137 
138  void ExecInstr::deschedule()
139  {
140  Tick t = SIMUL.getTime();
141 
142  DBGENTER(_INSTR_DBG_LEV);
143  DBGPRINT("Descheduling ExecInstr named: " << getName());
144 
145  _endEvt.drop();
146 
147  if (executing) {
148  CPU *p = _father->getOldCPU();
149  if (!dynamic_cast<CPU *>(p))
150  throw InstrExc("No CPU!",
151  "ExeInstr::deschedule()");
152 
153  double currentSpeed = p->getSpeed();
154 
155  actTime += ((double)(t - lastTime))*currentSpeed;// number of cycles
156  execdTime += (t - lastTime);// number of ticks
157  lastTime = t;
158  }
159  executing = false;
160 
161 
162  }
163 
164  void ExecInstr::setTrace(Trace *t) {
165  _endEvt.addTrace(t);
166  }
167 
168 
169  void ExecInstr::onEnd()
170  {
171  DBGENTER(_INSTR_DBG_LEV);
172  DBGPRINT("Ending ExecInstr named: " << getName());
173 
174  Tick t = SIMUL.getTime();
175  execdTime += t - lastTime;
176  flag = true;
177  executing = false;
178  lastTime = t;
179  actTime = 0;
180  _endEvt.drop();
181 
182  DBGPRINT("internal data set... now calling the _father->onInstrEnd()");
183 
184  _father->onInstrEnd();
185 
186 
187  }
188 
189 
190  void ExecInstr::reset()
191  {
192  DBGENTER(_INSTR_DBG_LEV);
193 
194  actTime = lastTime = 0;
195  flag = true;
196  execdTime = 0;
197 
198  DBGPRINT("internal data reset...");
199 
200 
201  }
202

204  Instr *FixedInstr::createInstance(vector<string> &par)
205  {
206  Task *task = dynamic_cast<Task *>(Entity::_find(par[1]));
207  return new FixedInstr(task, atoi(par[0].c_str()));
208  }

211  void ExecInstr::refreshExec(double oldSpeed, double newSpeed){
212  Tick t = SIMUL.getTime();
213  _endEvt.drop();
214  actTime += ((double)(t - lastTime))*oldSpeed;
215  execdTime += (t - lastTime);
216  lastTime = t;
217 
218  Tick tmp = 0;
219  if (((double)currentCost) > actTime)
220  tmp = (Tick) ceil ((((double) currentCost) - actTime)/newSpeed);
221 
222  _endEvt.post(t + tmp);
223  }
224 
225 }
